comments:
RC4

- I was starting a 'create patch', the create patch dialog showed up, but at the same time a separate dialog, 'Internal Error' appeared as well.
- could not reproduce a second time
- log shows:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-05-16 10:16:34.462
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronize View: Processing label changes".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.CompositeModelProvider.clearProviders(CompositeModelProvider.java:245)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.CompositeModelProvider.recursiveClearModelObjects(CompositeModelProvider.java:240)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.ChangeSetModelProvider.recursiveClearModelObjects(ChangeSetModelProvider.java:286)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.clearModelObjects(AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.java:875)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.reset(AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.java:317)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.processEvent(SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.java:253)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:329)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
*** Bug 180389 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 174364 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 184055 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
occurred to me again in 3.3 M7
This is a concurrency flaw in the old Synchronize framework. The fix will be to move Create Patch to the new framework (see bug 185126).
occurred to me again in 3.4 M2
